title: Extremely high ping spikes.
body: So far (since latest patch), my ping has been jumping from about 40-60 to **over** 700 at random. The only temp fix for this is to task manager kill league client and league itself, when I restart league it does a mini update then lets me log in and by that point im already way too far behind in game to actually do anything, other people are complaining about crashes and massive ping spikes but are there any fixes?

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes like this can be due to a network issue like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  You'll also get some troubleshoot steps specific to your results.  That should get you fixed up!
